title: Restrictions
description: Rules about how the data collection can be accessed or used.
usageNotes: Restrictions inform users that access to the data collection or certain variables may be limited, and that they should contact ICPSR directly to inquire about accessing them.
examples: The public-use data files in this collection are available for access by the general public.
This material is sensitive in nature and is available as restricted data through ICPSR. Users are required to apply for access, and there may be a wait time before access can be provided.
